We request your permission for Location Device information Storage and gallery We access your storage and gallery to choose and set your profile image. We access your camera for taking photos to set your profile image. We collect and monitor your device information, such as device ongoing calls state like idle,ringing,offhook to stop the updation of driver available location when the driver is in ongoing calls. We collect your contact information to ensure that you can reach your friends and family during an emergency situation by clicking the SOS button. We collect and monitor your current location to provide booking and delivery requests and track the trip and delivery progress You can change the above permissions from Phone Settings, at any time. Proceed See how we store, use and secure your data By clicking the check box, you agree to the Seero Captain of Seero Captain See How We Use Your Data We value your privacy and take all the measures necessary to protect your data at all times. The below important points are meant to help you understand how we collect and use your personal information. Brief Privacy Policy To provide better user experience of our mobile application and ensure that you are able to access all our features, we may collect and maintain your personal and other information which is shared by you or collected by us. We may collect, use, store, import and export your information and you are solely responsible for the accuracy of the details. To understand our policy, we request you to read our Privacy Policy. What do we collect? Seero Captain collects your personal information when you create, use and update your account. Using the information, we will be able to provide the complete experience of the application. The information we collect includes: \n(1)Personal data (e.g., name, location, and password) to create, update and maintain the account; \n(2)Contact data (e.g., email ID, address, and telephone or mobile number) to create, update and maintain the account and also send notifications; \n(3)Contract data (e.g., registration time and manner, and status) to review app usage; \n(4)Vehicle information (e.g., vehicle number, vehicle model, vehicle owner name, manufacturer and vehicle image); \n(5)Driving license, driving license expiry date and driving license image; \n(6)Location information to provide accurate ride booking and delivery requests; \n(7)Device information (e.g., device manufacturer,device token, device ID and device time) to access app usage and avoid unauthorized access; \n(8)Camera, photos and gallery to set and update profile photo; \n(9)Internet information to verify the availability of network and Wifi connectivity; \n(10)We use device manufacturer information for custom OS devices which protect background services from running for battery optimization.With this information,we prevent devices from killing background services once the application is disabled from the Protected apps section of Device Settings. \n(11)Access and initiate phone calls without using the dialer UI; and \n(12)GPS information to verify its connection. \n(13)In our local storage, we are storing the error logs of driver api to know the issues and also places api,geocode and direction api result to reduce the hits for same location. \nTo know more, read our Privacy Policy. What do we use it for? The personal information will be collected, used and stored for the purpose of creating and maintaining your account. We will also collect the information to help drivers in getting incoming ride and delivery requests. To know more, please read our Privacy Policy. How do we protect your data? We use proper technical and organizational security measures to protect your sensitive and personal information. The transfer of information between MoveX and any other devices is in an encrypted form (SSL data). We adopt security measures based on the industry standards to prevent any modification, damage or loss of the data. To know more, please read our Privacy Policy. Know your rights Subject to and in accordance with the agreed Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy, you also have the rights to know the purpose for which your information is collected, the kind of data that is collected, the way the data is stored and which agency collects and manages your information. You also have the right to correct, delete and modify your personal information and withdraw the consent which is given by you. To know more, please read our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions. You need to agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions to proceed further. You have denied location permission We require your location permission Without providing the location permission, you will not be able to use the app any further. You can change the above permission from your Phone Settings. Without providing the location permission, you will not be able to use the app any further. Are you sure you want to deny location permission? Edit Permission I\’m sure, exit the app Allows the application to initiate a phone call without using the Dialer user interface Terms & Conditions Exit anyway Call Permission Without providing the location permission, you will not be able to use the app any further (Mandatory) Contacts
